mlr3torch 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Merge by Product

    mlr_pipeops_torch_merge_prod.Rd

    Calculates the product of all input tensors.

    Format

    R6Class object inheriting from PipeOp/PipeOpTorch/PipeOpTorchMerge.

    Construction

    PipeOpTorchMergeProd$new(id = "nn_merge_prod", innum = 0, param_vals = list())

    • id :: character(1)
      The id for the object. The default is "nn_merge_prod".

    • param_vals :: named list()
      List of hyperparameter settings to overwrite the initial values. Default is list().

    • innum :: integer(1)
      The number of inputs. Default is 0 which means there is one vararg input channel.

    State

    The state is the value calculated by the public method shapes_out().

    Parameters

    No parameters.

    Fields

    Only fields inherited from PipeOpTorch/PipeOp{mlr3pipelines}].

    Methods

    Only methods inherited from PipeOpTorch/PipeOp{mlr3pipelines}].

    Internals

    Calls nn_merge_prod() when trained.

    Input and Output Channels

    PipeOpTorchMerges has either a vararg input channel if the constructor argument innum is not set, or input channels "input1", ..., "input<innum>". There is one output channel "output". For an explanation see PipeOpTorch.

    See also

    Other PipeOpTorch: mlr_pipeops_torch_avg_pool1d, mlr_pipeops_torch_avg_pool2d, mlr_pipeops_torch_avg_pool3d, mlr_pipeops_torch_avg_pool, mlr_pipeops_torch_batch_norm, mlr_pipeops_torch_celu, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv1d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv2d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv3d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv_transpose1d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv_transpose2d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv_transpose3d, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv_transpose, mlr_pipeops_torch_conv, mlr_pipeops_torch_dropout, mlr_pipeops_torch_elu, mlr_pipeops_torch_flatten, mlr_pipeops_torch_gelu, mlr_pipeops_torch_glu, mlr_pipeops_torch_hard_shrink, mlr_pipeops_torch_hardsigmoid, mlr_pipeops_torch_hard, mlr_pipeops_torch_head, mlr_pipeops_torch_layer_norm, mlr_pipeops_torch_leaky_relu, mlr_pipeops_torch_log_sigmoid, mlr_pipeops_torch_max_pool1d, mlr_pipeops_torch_max_pool2d, mlr_pipeops_torch_max_pool3d, mlr_pipeops_torch_max_pool, mlr_pipeops_torch_merge_cat, mlr_pipeops_torch_merge_sum, mlr_pipeops_torch_merge, mlr_pipeops_torch_model_classif, mlr_pipeops_torch_model_regr, mlr_pipeops_torch_model, mlr_pipeops_torch_prelu, mlr_pipeops_torch_relu6, mlr_pipeops_torch_relu, mlr_pipeops_torch_reshape, mlr_pipeops_torch_rrelu, mlr_pipeops_torch_selu, mlr_pipeops_torch_sigmoid, mlr_pipeops_torch_softmax, mlr_pipeops_torch_softplus, mlr_pipeops_torch_softshrink, mlr_pipeops_torch_softsign, mlr_pipeops_torch_squeeze, mlr_pipeops_torch_tanhshrink, mlr_pipeops_torch_tanh, mlr_pipeops_torch_threshold, pipeop_torch_linear

    Examples

    obj = po("nn_merge_prod")
obj$id
#> [1] "nn_merge_prod"
obj$module_generator
#> <nn_merge_prod> object generator
#>   Inherits from: <inherit>
#>   Public:
#>     .classes: nn_merge_prod nn_module
#>     initialize: function () 
#>     forward: function (...) 
#>     clone: function (deep = FALSE) 
#>   Parent env: <environment: 0x55f2ed5ea8e8>
#>   Locked objects: FALSE
#>   Locked class: FALSE
#>   Portable: TRUE
obj$shapes_out(list(input1 = c(16, 5, 5), input2 = c(16, 5, 5)))
#> $output
#> [1] 16  5  5
#>
